All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminService
Manages the requests and responses to and from the server for the ClearApplication endpoint.
AuthService
 
AuthToken
The AuthToken class is used by the server to keep track of users who are logged in and playing games.
Bishop
 
Board
 
ChessBoard
A chessboard that can hold and rearrange chess pieces.
ChessGame
For a class that can manage a chess game, making moves on a board Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessGame.TeamColor
Enum identifying the 2 possible teams in a chess game
ChessMove
Represents moving a chess piece on a chessboard Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessPiece
Represents a single chess piece Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessPiece.PieceType
The various different chess piece options
ChessPosition
Represents a single square position on a chess board Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
DataAccess
In-memory representation of @DataAccessInterface.
DataAccessException
Indicates there was an error connecting to the database
DataAccessInterface
Represents all the functions that can be called on the database.
Game
 
GameData
The GameData model is the way that games are stored in the database, and it contains all the information about a game that the server needs.
GameJoinRequest
The purpose of this class is to provide a structure for the JSON serialization of the join game HTTP request.
GameService
Manages the requests and responses for all the Game endpoints in the server.
InvalidMoveException
Indicates an invalid move was made in a game
King
 
Knight
 
Main
 
Move
 
Pawn
 
Piece
 
Position
 
Queen
 
Rook
 
Server
 
ServerException
Used by the server to send an Exception with an error code and message when something goes wrong.
Service
The Service base class provides the getBody
UserData
The UserData model is how users' data is stored in the server.
UserService
Manages the requests and responses to and from the server for the User related endpoints (Register User)
